resources.string: Tap Lock uses NFC and Bluetooth to lock and unlock PCs.\u000A\u000ASetup:\u000A\u000A1. Install Java 1.5+ on the PC\u000A2. Download and Extract the Tap Lock Server on the PC from https://github.com/piusvelte\u000A3. Configure the Tap Lock Server according to the README from the extracted download\u000A4. Make sure that Bluetooth is enabled on the PC and that the Tap Lock Server is running\u000A5. In the Tap Lock app, on the Android device, press Add device to setup the PC\u000A6. After pairing with the PC, select that newly added device for further options
